data.value: We are positioned among the top 100 best universities in the world today!

One of the world's top universities, Universalis was founded on the ideal of interactive learning that's individual, purposeful and effective. Here, both undergraduate and graduate students study and connect with each other though our own Learning Management System called USALIS. Students all have the chance to study in the best environment with modern technologies, large classrooms, new library with many additional books and seats.

data.value: We offer more than 40 undergraduate courses at Universalis for a wide range of subjects (economics, political science, languages, etc.) Easily find out different postgraduate course types and subject areas with very flexible timing. Best time to join as a postgraduate student. We look forward to providing students with the newest technologies but don't want our students to rely much on them.All students welcome new library ready room near the campus of Universalis.
